alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 1:05PM MST until October 15 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 105 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Mountain Park to near Downtown Mesa to near Goldfield, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Laveen, East Mesa, Gold Canyon, Sugarloaf Mountain and Sun Lakes. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 140 and 171. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 209. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
